events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund for the item.
The issue described has been identified as a refund request related to a sizing problem with the purchased jacket.
The customer's refund case has been assigned to a dedicated support representative for further handling.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear the jacket did not fit as expected. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been used or washed since purchase?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still in its original packaging, so it should be eligible for a refund.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund as soon as we receive the returned jacket. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and for sending the label. I appreciate the smooth handling of the return process.
We have received the returned jacket and completed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund. Please let us know if there’s anything else we can help you with.
Since your refund was successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case now.
